General.Name: Kendrick Resources PLC
General.Description: Kendrick Resources PLC engages in the engages in the exploitation and development of mineral resources. It explores for nickel, cobalt, copper, and vanadium. The company's projects include the Airijoki Vanadium project in Sweden; the Central Sweden projects covering a combined area of 197.2 square kilometers in Sweden; the Koitelainen Vosa Vanadium Project comprising a single granted exploration permit covering 13.72 square kilometers located in Finland; and the Karhujupukka Vanadium and Nickel project that comprises two granted exploration permits covering a combined area of 6.5 square kilometers in Finland. It also has an option agreement to acquire the Espedalen Nickel project comprising 16 granted exploration concessions covering a combined area of 139.9 square kilometers; the Sigdal Nickel and Gold project comprising two separate land holdings covering a combined area of 30 square kilometers; and the Hosanger Nickel project comprising four granted exploration concessions covering a combined area of 40 square kilometers in Norway. The company was formerly known as BMR Group PLC and changed its name to Kendrick Resources PLC in February 2021. Kendrick Resources PLC was incorporated in 1989 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 7/8 Kendrick Mews, London, United Kingdom, SW7 3HG
